mapper.insert: { CALL sp_tb_usuario_insert( #{codPerfil, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{idPerfil, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{nombre, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{apPaterno, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{apMaterno, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{nroDni, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{fchNacimiento, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{sexo, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{estadoAlumno, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{idApoderado, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{nroTelefono, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{tipoOperador, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{codOperador, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{correo, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{direccion, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{copiDni, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{copiPartidaNacimiento, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{foto, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{certEstudio, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{codError, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = OUT}, #{msgError, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = OUT} ) }
mapper.select: {CALL sp_tb_usuario_list( #{idUsuario, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{codPerfil, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{nroDni, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{nombre, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{apPaterno, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{apMaterno, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{fchInicio, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{fchFin, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{estadoAlumno, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN} ) }
mapper.update: { CALL sp_tb_usuario_update( #{idUsuario, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{codPerfil, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{idPerfil, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{nombre, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{apPaterno, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{apMaterno, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{nroDni, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{fchNacimiento, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{sexo, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{estadoAlumno, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{idApoderado, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{idContacto, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{nroTelefono, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{tipoOperador, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{codOperador, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{correo, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{direccion, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{idDetalle, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{copiDni, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{copiPartidaNacimiento, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{foto, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{certEstudio, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{idCurso, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{codError, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = OUT}, #{msgError, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = OUT} ) }
mapper.select: {CALL sp_tb_alumno_matricula_list ( #{idUsuario, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{codPerfil, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{nroDni, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{nombre, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{apPaterno, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{apMaterno, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{estadoAlumno, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{seccion, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{idGrado, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{anio, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} ) }
